name: neoWidgets
short_description:
neoWidgets has basically evolved into the opposite of the big frameworks (wxWidgets, Qt):
- not cross-platform, just Windows
- not compatible to old compilers, uses C++11 extensively

I created it to write small utility programs, and to see if I could make a better Windows API framework than MFC. If someone else finds it useful, let me know.

For documentation, click the link below
summary: Lightweight, windows-based, C++11 compliant widget framework
